resources.string: Welcome to call your folks! We\'ll remind you when you haven\'t talked to contacts in a while.
Choose how frequently you would like to talk to {CONTACT} on the phone:
We\'ll remind you when you should catch up with your contacts. Add a new reminder or edit a current reminder below.

string.name: hide_welcome_text
string.i: (Finished reading? Tap the text above to hide it.)
